channel.title: [317]NoXlite[Delta]
channel.description:
Im gonna give you noxlite source and client!
[size=24pt]CLIENT[/size]
Special Made Texture For Home And Water "AWESOME" Dragon claws with 4 hit special (not emote) Chaotic Maul and Longsword! Staff Of Light Corporeal beast Bork! bandos scimitar, whip and shield Dragon Platebody :P Primal 2h Death Cape Some Random Stuff :/ Auras with diffrent stats :eek: 4 New GodSwords (All Dont Got Emote!) Reclored Whips Zedd :P Much Much More...
[size=24pt]SOURCE[/size]
Skills! Attack Strength Defence Hitpoints Ranged Magic Prayer Herblore Mining Smithing Farming Slayer Firemaking Woodcutting Runecrafting Fletching Crafting Thieving Agility
MINIGAMES
Barrows (not the real place) Fight Pits (Working good) Pest Control (with Rewards no npcs inside just portals) Assoult (with reward shop) -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Source Got Quest Tab Teleport or give item Command Awesome Home Awesome Pk System with Killstreak and ranks (killstreaks are not working so good maybe you can fix it) Awesome Yell system :) "Awesome" Bosses Demon Chicken, Chaos Elemental & more All Skills Working (Farming Working but no place to level on) Nice Shops at home Many Secrets! No Fucking MD5 that means you can see all players password!
Here is some Pictures HOME [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2lbn7ur.jpg[/img]
Dragon Claws [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2hg7nmc.jpg[/img]
Thieving at Back of home [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2n2057m.jpg[/img]
Downloads
CLIENT http://uppit.com/nwjctjq3pmrg/NoXlite_Client.rar SOURCE http://uppit.com/zr7bu50ojjsh/NoXlite.rar
[size=24pt]How to change The Ip[/size]
you can do it on 2 ways
1 is to start client and press server selection at the corner you can add 5 servers Best way! ;) 2 open up client.java and search for "81.231.189.25" and change to your ip.
I Don't have time to tell more or add more pics see yah!
Put Your Ip on this topic so can i help you get players!

item.title: [317]NoXlite[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Constructive Criticism

[ul][li]The server does not look stable at all[/li]
[li]I doubt the skills are re-written, just shitty delta skills[/li]
[li]The home is overused, and the walls of the bank look bad[/li]
[li]The HP Bars and Hit splats are the ugliest I’ve ever seen[/li]
[li]Customs are horrible[/li][/ul]

There is just… so much wrong with the source/client.
I wouldn’t recommended downloading this if I were you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]NoXlite[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Saw this other day been meaning to try it out( I just enjoy messing with deltas tbh…)

will report back with bugs when I get a chance.

first thing first…don’t name folders the same xD

played it a while has some good edits but honestly can’t see it ever being a successful server <3

Rearranged some items etc but just didn’t have the right feel to me. Also, edited combat somewhat and found out didn’t help much. Not bad magic though had to fix a couple of spells.

p.s. the ibans staff inside the store was a good idea wish I saw that more xD

Read full topic

xxkiller912:

why cant u spawn items as a owner or admin?

item.title: [317]NoXlite[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I think having the customs in the server is a bit too much and therefore should be remove from both client and server, and I would recommend changing the home to a new home even Varrock would be nice instead of the over-used Edgeville.

You could attempt to clean up the source, but good luck with future releases.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]NoXlite[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

xxkiller912:

why cant u spawn items as a owner or admin?

The command “item” or “pickup” is probably set as the owner’s name. Look for “pickup” somewhere (Not familiar with delta at all) and then check out what it says.

– At the topic
Good job, can I see a picture of the gameframe please?

You should also avoid customs if you want a better server.

Read full topic
